name: Amunets Server Transfer
description:
[b]Mod-ID[/b]: 2305969565

A server cluster solution for conan - kinda.
This mod allows switching "on the fly" between servers (and taking your character with you).
changeNote:
2020-12-05 - 1.0.8
- fixed an issue with config not saving on g-portal. (thanks Sir Henry Vale - again)
- fixed an issue with "feat points spent" not importing correctly. (thanks Aalwein)

enjoy the extra feat points you've got ;)
author: LilMissHentai
